template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the {industry} space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the fintech space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.

message.content: Research the student loan refinance market, then produce a consistent blog post, video, and email series to generate qualified leads and track their conversion rate.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a concise prompt under 45 words for a fintech content campaign. It needs to cover research, multi-format creation, channel consistency, and measurable goals. 

I should focus on the core elements: starting with research, then creating diverse content, ensuring brand alignment, and ending with performance tracking. 

The phrasing should be direct and action-oriented. Maybe structure it as a sequence of tasks bundled into one sentence. 

Keeping it under 45 words means avoiding fluff. Let me draft a tight sequence: research → create → unify → measure.
